artist: Artist: Utagawa Hiroshige; Publisher: Fujiokaya Hikotarō
catalogue_raissonne: Ukiyo-e shūka 14 (1981), Hiroshige list, p. 240, chūtanzaku #9.6
creditline: Gift of Louis W. Hill, Jr.
inscription: Poem (Kokinshû 249, Hyakunin isshu 22): Fuku kara ni/ aki no kusaki no/ shioureba/ mube yamakaze o/ arashi to iuran
medium: Woodblock print (nishiki-e); ink and color on paper
portfolio: From Untitled series of Six Poetic Immortals
title: Bun'ya no Yasuhide
